r.s: File_Fortune and File_Fortune_Writer provide an interface for reading from and writing to fortune files.
r.d:
File_Fortune provides a PHP interface to reading fortune files. With it, you may retrieve a single fortune, a random fortune, or all fortunes in the file.
File_Fortune_Writer provides an interface for manipulating the contents of a fortune file. It allows you to write a complete fortune file and the associated binary header file from an array of fortunes. You may also add fortunes, delete fortunes, or update individual fortunes in a fortune file. All write operations will produce a binary header file to allow for greater compatability with the fortune and fortune-mod programs (as well as other fortune interfaces).
